home.title: Hytale Modlama için #1 kaynak {flipwords}
home.description: The number one community resource for modding Hytale, featuring comprehensive guides, detailed documentation, and essential tools to kickstart your modding journey.

sponsors.title: Support Us
sponsors.description: HytaleModding is an open-source community project, and part of managing the community involves paying for services, servers and infrastructure, like hosting this website. If you would like to support the project, consider becoming a sponsor! We use OpenCollective so you can see how funds are being used to support the community.
